entry.title: 我的第一篇测试文章
entry.content:
风景夫人费收费方式覅说覅收费方式反馈你剪短发几个房间更便捷的发布国家

 $productSystem='sunlands-cronus'; $messageType='EXTERNAL'; $groupNum=1; $createTime=time()*1000; $tplNumber='114528496812032'; $key="sunland"; //MD5（productSystem + messageType + groupNum + createTime + Key）32位字符串 $signData=md5($productSystem .$messageType . $groupNum.$createTime.$key); $params=array (     'head' =>         array (             'productSystem' => $productSystem,             'messageType' => $messageType,             'groupNum' => $groupNum,             'operator' => 'tongzhimin',             'createTime' => $createTime,             'tplNumber' => $tplNumber,             'signData' => $signData,         ),     'body' =>         array (             0 =>                 array (                     'mobile' => '17600185692',                     'param' =>                         array (                           'code'=>12345                         ),                     'sendMarking' => '75',                     'category1' => '教研教学',                     'category2' => '课程规划',                     'category3' => '开课通知',                 ),         ), );var_dump( ConsultationApi::init()->sendSms("requestJson=".json_encode($params,true)));die;
entry.summary:
